thread.title: Goalscoring hero Sadio Mane praises Liverpool win as Reds batter Spurs in crunch Premier League clash
thread.title_full: Goalscoring hero Sadio Mane praises Liverpool win as Reds batter Spurs in crunch Premier League clash

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Goalscoring hero Sadio Mane praises Liverpool win as Reds batter Spurs in crunch Premier League clash
text:
Goalscoring hero Sadio Mane praises Liverpool win as Reds batter Spurs in crunch Premier League clash The Senegal international marked his second start since returning from the AFCON with a devastating brace Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Sadio Mane speaks after match-winning display Share this video Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Sadio Mane has praised Liverpool following their emphatic display and 2-0 win over Spurs on Saturday. 
The Senegal international, who missed seven Reds games, marked his second start since returning from the AFCON with a devastating brace. 
Liverpool battered their visitors all over the pitch and could have easily been three or four nil up at half-time. 
Mane scored two in two minutes just after quarter of an hour, and nearly had a third only moments later. 
Spurs upped their game in the second half but failed to make an impact of any kind. Mane tucks away his first (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
Speaking to BT Sport after the game, Mane said: "What is important is the team, we have a great team. We have had a difficult few weeks but that can happen in football. 
"We are all going in the same direction. We deserved to win. Mane celebrates putting Liverpool in front (Photo: Getty Images) 
"We played very well with and without the ball." 
BT Sport is your home of unmissable live football from the Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League and FA Cup. Visit btsport.com for more info. Like us on Facebook
